a non-passenger train derailed between smithsonian and federal triangle stations.
orange and blue line trains began single tracking between mcpherson square and federal center sw.

smithsonian and federal triangle stations remained closed, and silver line trains ran between wiehle-reston east and east falls church only. at 8:00 p.m. smithsonian and federal triangle stations reopened. single track service continued through the remainder of the service day. passengers experienced significant delays and crowding.
smithsonian and federal triangle stations were closed. shuttle bus service was provided. silver line trains operated between wiehle-reston east and east falls church only. at approximately 2:20 p.m.
